promptPlaceholder: Describe your vision... e.g., 'A cat in the style of Van Gogh'
resultPanelDescription: Upload images and write a prompt to begin.
dropImagePrompt: Drop image here or click to browse
errorNoImageOrPrompt: Please upload at least one image or write a prompt to generate.
errorNoImageInResponse: The model did not return an image. Please try a different prompt or different images.
errorGenerationBlocked: Generation was blocked due to safety policies. Please adjust your prompt.
errorGenerationFailed: An unexpected error occurred during generation. Please try again.
promptToggleInstruction: The default prompt will fuse your images. Add a custom prompt for more control.
agentWelcome: Hello! I'm your creative assistant. I can see your uploaded images and help you come up with great prompts.
agentError: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
agentStartingMultipleGenerations: OK, starting to generate {count} images for you...
helpGuidedModeDesc: Provides structural control. Upload specific images for 'Character', 'Environment', and 'Style' to guide the final creation. It's perfect for when you have a clear vision.
helpFreestyleModeDesc: Unleash your creativity! Mix up to five different images without any constraints. This mode is great for experimental and unexpected fusions.
helpAgentDesc: Your AI partner. The agent can see your uploaded images and the last generated result. You can ask it to: suggest prompt ideas, write or update prompts, switch between Structured and Freestyle modes, start one or more generations, and even download the current image or an image from your history. Just tell it what you want!
